_comment: This file specifies for each panel in a strip in a page:
* plotItemCount: the number of plot items
The panel may be represented by a single plotItemCount value, or multiple values as specified in panelProperties.
You can specify options for pages and strips in an additional first object element in the array of strips or panels,
For pages the available options are:
* hStrips: an array of strip heights between 0 (no height) and 1 (page height)
For strips the available options are:
* wPanels: an array of panel widths between 0 (no width) and 1 (page width)
